#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	int mat[n][n];
	int top=0,left=0,right=n-1,bottom=n-1;
	int p=1;
	while(true)
	{
		for(int i=left;i<=right;i++)
			mat[top][i]=p++;
		top++;//1
		if(top>bottom ||left>right)
		break;
		for(int i=top;i<=bottom;i++)
			mat[i][right]=p++;
		right--;//2
		if(top>bottom ||left>right)
		break;
		for(int i=right;i>=left;i--)
			mat[bottom][i]=p++;
		bottom--;//3
		if(top>bottom ||left>right)
		break;
		for(int i=bottom;i>=top;i--)
			mat[i][left]=p++;
		left++;//4

		if(top>bottom ||left>right)
		break;

		for(int i=top;i<=bottom;i++)
			mat[i][left]=p++;
		left++;//5
	
		if(top>bottom ||left>right)
		break;
		
		for(int i=left;i<=right;i++)
		mat[bottom][i]=p++;
		bottom--;//6
		if(top>bottom ||left>right)
		break;
		for(int i=bottom;i>=top;i--)
		mat[i][right]=p++;
		right--;//7
		if(top>bottom ||left>right)
		break;
		
		for(int i=right;i>=left;i--)
		mat[top][i]=p++;
		top++;//8;
		if(top>bottom ||left>right)
		break;
	}
	
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
		cout<<mat[i][j]<<" ";
		cout<<"\n";
	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
